trans-unit.source: Provides a menu system for a form.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um sistema de menus para um formulário.

trans-unit.source: MenuStrip is the top-level container that supersedes <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.
trans-unit.target: MenuStrip é o contêiner de nível superior que substitui <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: It also provides key handling and multiple document interface (MDI) features.
trans-unit.target: Ele também fornece tratamento de chaves e documento vários recursos de interface (MDI).

trans-unit.source: Functionally, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> work along with MenuStrip, although they are derived from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.
trans-unit.target: Funcionalmente, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>trabalhar com MenuStrip, embora eles são derivados da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem>

trans-unit.source: The following items are specifically designed to work seamlessly with both <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> in all orientations.
trans-unit.target: Os itens a seguir foram especificamente projetados para funcionar perfeitamente com ambos <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer>em todas as orientações.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>

trans-unit.source: They are available by default at design time for the MenuStrip control: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> The MenuStrip control represents the container for the menu structure of a form.
trans-unit.target: Eles estão disponíveis por padrão em tempo de design para o controle MenuStrip:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox>a MenuStrip controle representa o contêiner para a estrutura de menu de um formulário.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripComboBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: You can add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> objects to the MenuStrip that represent the individual menu commands in the menu structure.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>objetos que representam os comandos de menu individuais na estrutura de menu a MenuStrip.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> can be a command for your application or a parent menu for other submenu items.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>pode ser um comando para seu aplicativo ou o menu pai para outros itens de submenu.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Although MenuStrip replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora MenuStrip substitui e adiciona a funcionalidade para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>controle de versões anteriores, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e o uso futuro, se você escolher.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MainMenu>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> to which you can add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> objects.
trans-unit.target: Use este construtor para criar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>para que você pode adicionar <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref> supports overflow functionality.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref> dá suporte à funcionalidade de estouro.

trans-unit.source: The overflow feature moves menu items to a drop-down menu when there is not enough room to display them in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: O recurso de estouro move itens de menu a um menu suspenso quando não há espaço suficiente para exibi-los em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: When you set the CanOverflow property to `true`, you must also enable overflow for specific menu items by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Overflow%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define a propriedade CanOverflow como `true`, você também deve habilitar o estouro de itens de menu específicos definindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Overflow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.Overflow%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, menu items are not displayed if they cannot fit within the available space.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, os itens de menu não são exibidos se eles não podem se ajustar dentro do espaço disponível.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref> supports overflow functionality; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref> dá suporte à funcionalidade de estouro; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: Cria um novo objeto de acessibilidade para o controle.

trans-unit.source: If you do not explicitly call the CreateAccessibilityInstance method, it will be called when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is referenced.
trans-unit.target: Se você não chamar explicitamente o método CreateAccessibilityInstance, ele será chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade é referenciada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para obter ou definir o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, você deve adicionar uma referência para o `Accessibility` assembly instalado com o .NET Framework.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For a code example of using CreateAccessibilityInstance, see <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de código de uso CreateAccessibilityInstance, consulte <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> for the control.
trans-unit.target: Um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> para o controle.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> with the specified text, image, and event handler on a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> com o manipulador de eventos, a imagem e texto especificado em um novo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the CreateDefaultItem method to add a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> with commonly used characteristics to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>.
trans-unit.target: Use o método CreateDefaultItem para adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>com características usadas para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The text to use for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O texto a ser usado para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: If the `text` parameter is a hyphen (-), this method creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Se o `text` parâmetro é um hífen (-), esse método cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSeparator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to display on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"> </xref> para exibir o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An event handler that raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"></xref> event when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Um manipulador de eventos que gera a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click"> </xref> eventos quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Image%2CSystem.EventHandler%29?displayProperty=fullName>, or a if the text parameter is a hyphen (-).
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Drawing.Image%2CSystem.EventHandler%29?displayProperty=fullName>, ou um se o text parâmetro é um hífen (-).

trans-unit.source: Gets the default spacing, in pixels, between the sizing grip and the edges of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento padrão, em pixels, entre a alça de dimensionamento e as bordas do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> values representing the spacing, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref>valores que representa o espaçamento, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: Gets the spacing, in pixels, between the left, right, top, and bottom edges of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref> from the edges of the form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o espaçamento, em pixels, entre a esquerda, direita, superior e bordas inferior do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref> as bordas do formulário.

trans-unit.source: Use the DefaultPadding property to set the interior space between controls.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade DefaultPadding para definir o espaçamento interior entre controles.

trans-unit.source: When a control is a container of items, padding represents the space from the edge of the container.
trans-unit.target: Quando um controle é um contêiner de itens, o preenchimento representa o espaço da borda do contêiner.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> that represents the spacing.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"> </xref> que representa o espaçamento.

trans-unit.source: The default is `{Left=6, Top=2, Right=0, Bottom=2}`.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é `{Left=6, Top=2, Right=0, Bottom=2}`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref> by default.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se as dicas de ferramenta serão mostradas para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref> por padrão.

trans-unit.source: The DefaultShowItemToolTips property always returns `false` because typically, ToolTips are not used for menus or menu items.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade DefaultShowItemToolTips sempre retorna `false` porque, normalmente, as dicas de ferramenta não são usadas para menus ou itens de menu.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>em todos os casos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal and vertical dimensions, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref> when it is first created.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as dimensões horizontais e verticais, em pixels, do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref> quando ele é criado.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> value representing the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref> horizontal and vertical dimensions, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> valor que representa o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref> dimensões horizontais e verticais, em pixels.

trans-unit.source: The default is 200 x 21 pixels.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é 21 x 200 pixels.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visibility of the grip used to reposition the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a visibilidade da alça usada para reposicionar o controle.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripGripStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> that is used to display a list of Multiple-document interface (MDI) child forms.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> que é usado para exibir uma lista de formulários de filho MDI MDI (interface).

trans-unit.source: Use the MdiWindowListItem property to designate or discover which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem> displays MDI children.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade MdiWindowListItem para designar ou descobrir qual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>exibe filhos MDI.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate> events on child menus to reflect changes to the value of MdiWindowListItem.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate>eventos nos menus filho para refletir as alterações para o valor de MdiWindowListItem.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"></xref> that represents the menu item displaying a list of MDI child forms that are open in the application.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripMenuItem"> </xref> que representa o item de menu exibindo uma lista de formulários filho MDI que estão abertos no aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user accesses the menu with the keyboard or mouse.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o usuário acessa o menu com o teclado ou mouse.

trans-unit.source: When activated by the ALT key, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> typically neither take nor remove the focus from the control that currently has the focus.
trans-unit.target: Quando ativado, a tecla ALT, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>normalmente não levar nem remover o foco do controle que tem o foco no momento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: If there is a control hosted within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> or a drop-down of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, the control gains focus when the user presses the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Se houver um controle hospedado dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>ou uma lista suspensa do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o controle obtém foco quando o usuário pressiona a tecla TAB.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: In general, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> might not be raised when they are activated by the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>eventos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>não pode ser gerado quando são ativados por teclado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: In such cases, use the MenuActivate and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate> events instead.
trans-unit.target: Nesses casos, use o MenuActivate e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate>eventos em vez disso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref> is deactivated.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref> está desativado.

trans-unit.source: When activated by the ALT key, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> typically neither take nor remove the focus from the control that currently has the focus.
trans-unit.target: Quando ativado, a tecla ALT, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>normalmente não levar nem remover o foco do controle que tem o foco no momento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: If there is a control hosted within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> or a drop-down of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, the control gains focus when the user presses the TAB key.
trans-unit.target: Se houver um controle hospedado dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>ou uma lista suspensa do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o controle obtém foco quando o usuário pressiona a tecla TAB.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>

trans-unit.source: In general, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> might not be raised when they are activated by the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: Em geral, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>eventos de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>não pode ser gerado quando são ativados por teclado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus>

trans-unit.source: In such cases, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate> and MenuDeactivate events instead.
trans-unit.target: Nesses casos, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate>e MenuDeactivate eventos em vez disso.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a manipulação de eventos, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuActivate"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnMenuActivate method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnMenuActivate também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gera o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip.MenuDeactivate"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Gerar um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um representante.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [eventos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The OnMenuDeactivate method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O método OnMenuDeactivate também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.EventArgs>que contém os dados de evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Processes a command key.
trans-unit.target: Processa uma chave de comando.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passada por referência, que representa a mensagem de janela para processar.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values that represents the key to process.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valores que representa a chave para processar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the character was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o caractere foi processado pelo controle; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether ToolTips are shown for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se as dicas de ferramenta serão mostradas para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ShowItemToolTips property returns `false` by default because typically, ToolTips are not used for menus or menu items.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade retorna ShowItemToolTips `false` por padrão porque, normalmente, as dicas de ferramenta não são usadas para menus ou itens de menu.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if ToolTips are shown for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as dicas de ferramentas são exibidas para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref> stretches from end to end in its container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref> estende de ponta a ponta de seu contêiner.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"></xref> stretches from end to end in its container; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip"> </xref> estende de ponta a ponta de seu contêiner; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: Processa mensagens do Windows.

trans-unit.source: All messages are sent to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method after getting filtered through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Todas as mensagens são enviadas para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>método após ser filtrado por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.PreProcessMessage%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A> method corresponds exactly to the Windows `WindowProc` function.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>método corresponde exatamente ao Windows `WindowProc` função.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.WndProc%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing Windows messages, see the `WindowProc` function documentation in the Windows Platform SDK reference located in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o processamento de mensagens do Windows, consulte o `WindowProc` documentação de função na referência do SDK da plataforma Windows localizado na biblioteca MSDN em http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: The Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref> to process.
trans-unit.target: O Windows <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref> ao processo.
